title: Doctor Who & the Daleks
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Magic, Occult & Supernatural/Time travel in motion pictures
description: The Doctor (Peter Cushing), with his two granddaughters, Barbara and Susan, and Barbara's bumbling boyfriend, Ian, accidently set off on a journey through time in the Tardis- destination unknown. Landing on a planet of gloomy surroundings they come across the Daleks who are searching for a cure to protect them from radiation sickness- of which their planet is saturated. The other inhabitants of the planet, the Thal, have a drug to cure radition sickness and the Daleks will stop at nothing to obtain the information. A colourful, comical and serious film adaptation of the popular long running television serial. Starring Peter Cushing, Roberta Tovey, Jennie Linden and Ray Castle.
